description: While this is toggled, your joints will periodically flex, exercising you mildly to generate power passively. Not as powerful as the Metabolic Interchange, but still quite useful.
Your feet have been surgically modified with internal slots with pop-out motorized wheels, allowing you to move faster across all terrains while draining power.

Concealed in your left arm is a railgun designed to fire clusters of metal particulate at massively accelerated speeds.  The smaller size means that it is slower to reload and less powerful, and requires a lot of bionic energy to activate.  Activate the bionic to fire and reload it.

Your arms have been partially replaced with highly modular mechanical equivalents capable of extending outwards to smack your foes with steel fists at the ends. They can't do much else from that distance, though.
Concealed in your left arm is a submachine gun designed to use a variety of handgun ammunition types. Activate the bionic to fire and reload it.
Your wrists now contain cybernetic collapsing drills capable of tunneling through rock, soil, metal, and flesh easily.
Concealed in your left arm is a repeating coilgun able to fire bolts and arrows alike, used by extreme hunting enthusiasts. Activate the bionic to fire and reload it.
